pre-commit.command: branch=$(git branch --show-current) && if [ "$branch" = "main" ]; then echo 'ERROR: Cannot commit to main. Create a branch first.' && exit 1; fi

post-edit.command: if echo "$CLAUDE_EDITED_FILES" | grep -q '\.py$'; then ruff check --fix "$CLAUDE_EDITED_FILES" && ruff format "$CLAUDE_EDITED_FILES"; fi
